segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, looking so excited for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just waiting for her brother to hand her one, and she looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching for that jar, and I’m worried he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s not being careful at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t hurt himself trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dishes that she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like she should be watching them more closely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but the kids seem to be having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
